name: Tobacco Road
description: Pairing smoky mezcal with briny sherry and vegetal Cynar makes for one tasty drink with a great tobacco-laced scent. A pinch of salt and a grapefruit twist help bring out the flavors.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mezcal, Cynar, sherry and bitters to a rocks glass. Then add a large cube of ice.
Give a gentle stir (about 5 seconds), then garnish with a grapefruit twist, drop a pinch of salt on top of the ice and serve.
